question: The school library is seeking applicants for a job over summer break. Write a letter to the library’s manager, in your letter include:- A brief introduction of yourself- Your experience and relevant skills- Why you want the jobWrite at least 150 words. You do NOT need to write any addresses.
text: I am very much excited to see the vacancy for "Assistant to Librarian" in the school library due in summer break. I would like to apply for the position.

I am Mamta Bhole studying in the 8th grade at this school. I have been always a bright student. Me being detailed oriented, a follower of keeping  things organised, good at managing the IT system, and on top of that "the service-oriented" person, can weigh myself better while performing the responsibilities of this role. Eventually, it can help me project my resume with work experience acquired.

Apart from this, I am also in dire need of money as my parents, who work on a weekly wage basis, are severely ill and admitted to the hospital due to illness. So, I am the one who is currently looking after the household responsibilities, as I am eldest child, and need to pay my school fees too.
It would be great if you could select me for this position and I am also available for face to face interview if you  meneed.
Looking forward to your positive response.
